hero.title: Python →
hero.subtitle: Notebooks that tell your reasoning:
hero.subtitleLine3: Our AI analyzes, comments and structures your code automatically.
hero.demoDescription: This notebook performs a complete exploratory analysis of the client dataset. We will explore the purchase distribution, identify key segments and visualize the main trends.
hero.demoDescription2: The chart below shows the distribution of purchases by client segment. Premium clients represent 35% of the total volume.

features.title: Everything you need for perfect notebooks
features.subtitle: A complete pipeline from AI analysis to Jupyter export, without compromising on quality.

ai.title: Cutting-edge Claude AI
ai.description: Claude Sonnet 4.5 analyzes, documents and structures your code with professional precision.

jupytext.title: Native Jupytext format
jupytext.description: Conversion via Jupytext for perfectly formatted and universally compatible notebooks.

speed.title: Fast and instant
speed.description: Paste your code, click, and get a professional notebook in seconds.

export.title: Export .ipynb
export.description: Download directly in Jupyter Notebook format, ready for JupyterLab or Google Colab.

docs.title: Smart documentation
docs.description: The AI detects the script type and adapts comments: ML, data analysis, API, etc.

security.title: Secure
security.description: Your code is never stored beyond the conversion. Secure Firebase authentication.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your code into a professional notebook.

paste.title: 1. Paste your code
paste.description: Paste your Python script or drag and drop a .py file into the input area.

analyze.title: 2. AI analyzes and documents
analyze.description: Claude AI analyzes your code, adds explanations and structures it into Jupyter cells.

download.title: 3. Download the notebook
download.description: Get your professional .ipynb notebook, ready for JupyterLab or Google Colab.

metadata.homeTitle: Py2Nb — Convert your Python scripts to Jupyter notebooks with AI
metadata.homeDescription: Paste your Python code, AI adds structured markdown explanations, and download a professional Jupyter notebook (.ipynb). Free up to 3 conversions/month.
metadata.convertDescription: Paste your Python script or drag and drop a .py file. AI analyzes your code, adds structured documentation, and generates a professional Jupyter notebook (.ipynb) in seconds.
metadata.pricingTitle: Pricing — Free, Pro and Premium Plans
metadata.pricingDescription: Start for free with 3 conversions/month. Pro plan at €9.99/month for 50 conversions. Premium plan at €29.99/month for unlimited usage with REST API and priority support.
